setConfigOption

public static void setConfigOption(String option,
                                   Object value)
Sets a configuration option in server.properties.

Example: 

 setConfigOption("enable-command-block", true);

Parameters:
option -
value -

banUsername

public static void banUsername(String name,
                               String reason,
                               String source,
                               Date expireDate)
Bans a player from the server using banned-players.txt

This method is helpful because Bukkit by default does not allow banning with options (Expiry date, source, etc.). Any of these options may be omitted by passing in null to the corresponding parameter.

Parameters:
name - The username to ban.
reason - The reason for the ban.
source - The source for the ban.
expireDate - The expiry date for the ban.

unbanUsername

public static void unbanUsername(String name)
Unbans a username from banned-players.txt.

Parameters:
name - The username to unban.
See Also:
banUsername(String, String, String, Date)

banIp

public static void banIp(String ip,
                         String reason,
                         String source,
                         Date expiryDate)
Bans an IP from the server using banned-ips.txt

This method is helpful because Bukkit by default does not allow banning with options (Expiry date, source, etc.). Any of these options may be omitted by passing in null to the corresponding parameter.

Parameters:
ip - The IP to ban.
reason - The reason for the ban.
source - The source for the ban.
expiryDate - The expiry date for the ban.
